issue.title: [CF 1172] Black ox statue
issue.body:
When black ox statue (brewmaster monk) functionality changed last expac from a trackable shield buff to the simple threat item it is now,I have not been able to track it with TMW. Anything would be helpful, showing when its active with an icon, or showing an icon when it is missing. Any suggestions would be appreciated.

Thanks!


> Posted by CurseForge user maven1979 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1172 | Raw

comments.body:
I think its trackable as a totem, although I haven't been on my monk in a very long time so I'm not 100% sure on that.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

That works, thanks!


> Posted by CurseForge user maven1979
